nodes.text: The letter  was the twenty-sixth letter of the Aurebesh alphabet. It was pronounced "sen," and equaled the High Galactic characters SH.

In Legends continuity, this character is known as Shen. It is not known whether the character was renamed for Star Wars Rebels: Battle Plans from Darth Vader or if the new name is merely a typo. It should be noted that another Aurebesh character, Yirt (Y), is called "Yiry" in the book, but Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia uses the Legends name "Yirt".
